entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Author: Changbinsthang

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,271Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 74

Summary: Felix never expected his job to lead him here: standing in his boss‚Äôs living room, heart pounding as Chris steps closer, voice low and controlled, asking him to name the boundaries he doesn‚Äôt want crossed. Their arrangement was supposed to be professional. Structured. Safe. But the air between them is tight with something neither is ready to acknowledge. When Chris invites Felix to a high-stakes company dinner as his plus one‚Äîwith the promise of subtle touches, whispered cues, and a rival CEO known for showing off‚ÄîFelix realizes this is no longer just practice. Each session pushes them further, blurring professionalism with want, caution with craving. --- Felix is technically Chris' sugar baby but it's never outright said.

Even in the small windows of downtime they have, they're much too tired to play. What they do have is falling on top of each other exhausted, passing out as soon as their heads hit the pillow or the other's chest. Chan's hand in Minho's hair, Minho's face in his neck, their legs entangled under the warm sanctuary of their beds. Author: Wolffics

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,158Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: You waited six long months for the night that felt more like a dream than reality ‚Äî front row at a Stray Kids concert, close enough to feel the bass in your bones and watch Bang Chan breathe the same air as you. You‚Äôd always been just another fan in the crowd‚Ä¶ until the moment his eyes found yours. One glance becomes a second. A smile becomes a wink. And a coincidence becomes something far more dangerous when a staff member taps your shoulder after the show with a message that sends your world spinning: Bang Chan wants to see you backstage. Tonight, the distance between idol and fan disappears. Tonight, he chooses you.
